knimeNode.name: IUPAC to Structure
knimeNode.shortDescription: Retrieves various formats for a given molecule.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a valid IUPAC name into any of the following: png, cml, inchi, smiles, cdk molecule. The node uses the OPSIN (Open Parser for Systematic IUPAC nomenclature) web service for conversion.
fullDescription.option: IUPAC names column in input table.
Defines the return formats for the output table.
